snippet.title: Candle Knight - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010118
Xbox Store: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/candle-knight/9n447rtcfnct

Never let your light go out. Wield a powerful flame, overcome menacing creatures and explore the shadows of a ruined castle in this compelling 2.5D action adventure platformer which features a unique dynamic difficulty system.
 
Wield your flame to overcome menacing creatures lurking in the shadows of a ruined castle, use the dynamic difficulty system to your advantage, traverse challenging platforming sections and solve cryptic puzzles inside surreal paintings in this 2.5D action adventure platformer.
 
Features:

- A dynamic in-game difficulty system.
- Solve Mysteries inside surreal paintings.
- 2.5D platforming action game.
- Stunning visuals and characters.

https://www.jandusoft.com/candleknight
